EmailTemplate.name: ES- Kubernetes O'Reilly Book - Marketo.O'Reilly Kubernetes Report
EmailTemplate.subject: New O'Reilly Report: Managing Kubernetes Performance At Scale
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Kubernetes adoption has accelerated rapidly as teams have started to see its potential to bring their ideas to market faster. But, today’s containerized applications still introduce enough complexity to challenge even the best of teams. How can you overcome these challenges? <[[https://turbonomic.com/kubernetes-at-scale/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oSRyAAM]]> Check out this new eBook from O'Reilly and Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/kubernetes-at-scale/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oSRyAAM]]> to learn about common challenges in Kubernetes environments, operational tips for running Kubernetes clusters, and more! Regards,Jenna
